Christensen, L. P. ( 2009). Content and composition of volatile terpenes, flavonoids and phenolic acids in Greek Oregano ( Origanum vulgare L. ssp. hirtum) at different development stages during cultivation in cool temperate climate . European Journal of Horticultural Science, 74, 193– 203.
